data.title: Kiş climate: Weather Kiş & temperature by month
data.text:
>>Weather by month // weather averages Kiş

>>Climate graph // Weather by Month Kiş

>>average temperature by month Kiş

>>Weather Kiş

The climatic conditions in Kiş are mostly characterized by a frigid and moderate climate. The precipitation levels in Kiş are noteworthy, as there is rainfall even during the most arid month. According to the Köppen-Geiger classification, the prevailing climate in this region is categorized as Dfb. In Kiş, the average annual temperature is 6.8 °C | 44.2 °F. Each year, there is an approximate 684 mm | 26.9 inch of precipitation that occurs.

The specified area is located in the northern hemisphere of our planet. The onset of summer commences towards the conclusion of June and culminates by September. The season is characterized by a sequence of months, namely: June, July, August, September. The most favored period for a visit is during the months of July, August.

average temperature by month Kiş

The month of highest temperature is August during which the average temperature reaches up to 18.5 °C | 65.3 °F. The month of January is characterized by the lowest temperatures, which have an average reading of -4.6 °C | 23.7 °F.

Weather by month // weather averages Kiş

<>

Avg. Temperature °C (°F) Min. Temperature °C (°F) Max. Temperature °C (°F) Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in) Humidity (%) Rainy days (d) avg. Sun hours (hours)

January February March April May June July August September October November December

Data: 1991 - 2021 Min. Temperature °C (°F), Max. Temperature °C (°F), Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in), Humidity, Rainy days. Data: 1999 - 2019: avg. Sun hours

The precipitation variance between the months with the lowest and highest levels of rainfall is 60 mm | 2 inch. The fluctuation of temperatures over the course of a year is referred to as temperature variation.

It has been observed that April exhibits the highest relative humidity, with a percentage of 73.06. On the other hand, August experiences the lowest relative humidity at an approximate rate of 56.11. According to the data, May is observed as the month with maximum rainy days (14.73) while December has recorded minimum rainfall during its tenure (5.20).

Kiş weather and climate for every month

Airport close to Kiş

The closest Airports of Kiş are: Ganja International Airport (KVD) 93.63km,Heydar Aliyev International Airport (GYD) 255.78km,Nakhchivan Airport (NAJ) 272.61km

You can reach Kiş from this Cities by Plane: London (LHR), Vienna (VIE), Paris (CDG), Beijing (PEK), Ankara (ESB), Tabriz (TBZ), Kyiv (KBP), Minsk (MSQ), Almaty (ALA), Riga (RIX), Frankfurt am Main (FRA), Yekaterinburg (SVX), Novosibirsk (OVB), Omsk (OMS), Ufa (UFA), Tashkent (TAS), Astana (TSE), Dubai (DXB), Milan (MXP), Rome (FCO)
